itunes:title: Pragmatism, Pandemics and Prepping: What’s a Girl to Do?
title: Pragmatism, Pandemics and Prepping: What’s a Girl to Do?
description: How local farmers and a careful trip around the common grocery store can get you covered. Plus, Shaye and Angela's tips for those who are convinced homesteading is the way to go (hint: Now may not be the time for those gorgeous Lavender Orpingtons). Support the podcast at: Patreon.com/Homemakerchicpodcast.

itunes:author: Angela Reed & Shaye Elliott
